channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says U.S. will win the race on artificial intelligence
item.description: The White House unveiled a collection of initiatives that aim to make the U.S. the world leader of artificial intelligence.

item.title: DOJ Launches Strike Force To Investigate Obama Team’s ‘Weaponization’ Of Russia Hoax Against Trump
item.description: A federal Strike Force is made up of teams of investigators from multiple agencies working together to take on complex cases.

item.title: House GOP introduce resolution establishing new panel to continue Jan. 6 probe
item.description: House Republicans introduced a resolution Wednesday establishing a new select subcommittee to continue the investigation of the events surrounding the...

item.title: Appeals Court rules Trump's birthright citizenship order violates Constitution
item.description: President Trump's attempt to block the U.S. from recognizing birthright citizenship for children born to illegal immigrants runs afoul of the Constitu...

item.title: Bondi facing Democratic calls to testify following report she told Trump he was in Epstein files
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi is facing Democratic calls to testify before Congress following a newspaper's revelation that she told President Donald Tru...

item.title: NYC Mayor Adams dings Cuomo over 'history of sabotaging Black electeds'
item.description: Mayor Eric Adams is playing the race card against former Gov. Andrew Cuomo in the New York mayoral race.

item.title: DNI Tulsi Gabbard Dumps More Documents, Says She’s Referring Obama for Possible Criminal Prosecution
item.description: If there were a criminal offense that fit, Gabbard and Trump would cite it, rather than chanting ‘treason.’

item.title: Two Revealing Jokes Highlight the Democrats’ Internal Struggles
item.description: Courtesy of Rahm Emanuel and Zohran Mamdani.

item.title: FBI Analyst On Russia Hoax: ‘Our Instructions … Were To Push This’
item.description: An analyst interviewed by House investigators about claims of Russian collusion said FBI leadership made it clear 'we were to push this.'

item.title: Report: Russia Hoax Was Built On ‘One Scant, Unclear, And Unverifiable Fragment Of A Sentence’
item.description: CIA officers warned Brennan about the shoddy nature of the sentence fragment, and initially omitted the fragment in the report. But Brennan personally...

item.title: The One Big Beautiful Bill Is an Opportunity to Renew Federalism
item.description: For the first time, states have the directive and flexibility to put the truly needy first and help able-bodied adults return to the workforce.

item.title: Sesame Street Will Still Be Open
item.description: It’s now on Netflix, and it remains available for free on PBS.

item.title: This Left-Wing Education Juggernaut Doesn’t Deserve Federal Backing
item.description: The National Education Association’s real purpose is political. That doesn’t merit a government charter.

item.title: SCOTUS Hands Trump Win In Consumer Product Safety Commission Case
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court temporarily agreed on Wednesday that President Trump can fire three Democrat members of the Consumer Product Safety Commission....
